title: Minor timetable changes for bus services in the Cranbourne area
articleContent:
From 8 December, passengers in the Cranbourne area will enjoy new and accessible stops along Narre Warren-Cranbourne Road.

To access the new stops, passengers on routes 795, 796, 798, 799, 841, 881, 893, 897, 898 & 981 will have minor timetable changes in some sections of their trips.

To plan your journey:

  • Download the PTV app
  • Use the journey planner at ptv.vic.gov.au
  • Check your timetables:
    • Route 795 (PDF) 121 KB
    • Route 796 (PDF) 331 KB
    • Route 798 (PDF) 1.2 MB
    • Route 799 (PDF) 723 KB
    • Route 841 (PDF) 878 KB
    • Route 881 (PDF) 704 KB
    • Route 893 (PDF) 1.4 MB
    • Route 897 (PDF) 1.4 MB
    • Route 898 (PDF) 846 KB
    • Route 981 (PDF) 135 KB
  • or call 1800 800 007.

These upgrades are part of the Narre Warren-Cranbourne Road Upgrade Project, which includes extra lanes and upgraded intersections. For more information visit Narre Warren – Cranbourne Road Upgrade.
